alert.note: Alert for Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 16 at 9:51AM EDT until July 16 at 10:15AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Tornado Warning for... North central Rockingham County in southern New Hampshire... Southwestern Strafford County in central New Hampshire... * Until 1015 AM EDT. * At 951 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Raymond, or 10 miles south of Northwood, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Northwood around 1010 AM EDT. Barrington around 1015 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Nottingham, Lee, Deerfield, Strafford, Madbury and Candia. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
